sentences.chinese: 浅层毛细血管扩张充血，偶见渗血及嗜中性细胞。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of valsartan in the treatment of congestive heart failure(CHF).
sentences.chinese: 目的旨在探讨缬沙坦在充血性心力衰竭中的治疗作用。

sentences.english: Early afterdepolarizations are also responsible for the arrhythmias of congestive heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 早期去极化后也可引起充血性心衰的心律失常。

sentences.english: Lowering high blood pressure still prevents congestive heart failure and promotes kidney health.
sentences.chinese: 降低血压仍可防止充血性心力衰竭，促进肾脏健康。

sentences.english: Tan-yellow plaques are seen in the lower esophagus, along with mucosal hyperemia.
sentences.chinese: 食管下段可见黄褐色的斑块，同时黏膜充血。

sentences.english: Decongestant sprays and pills may reduce the swelling in your nasal passages.
sentences.chinese: 解充血喷雾以及药片或许能够减少你鼻道的肿胀。

sentences.english: Decongestants help ease stuffiness. They shrink swollen tissue inside the noses.
sentences.chinese: 解充血药帮助缓解鼻塞，使内部肿胀组织收缩。

sentences.english: Saline nose drops or sprays also ease congestion.
sentences.chinese: 苦涩的滴剂或喷剂亦可缓解充血。

sentences.english: The pathological changes are mainly enlargement of liver, hyperaemia of lungs and bronchi.
sentences.chinese: 主要得病理变化是肝大，肺及支气管充血。

sentences.english: Hyperemia was found in the kidney mesenchyme.
The sex organs become tumescent, i. e. engorged with blood.
sentences.chinese: 性器官变得膨胀起来，也就是说性器官充血。

sentences.english: Tarik passed away in 1994 due to congestive heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 塔里克于1994年因充血性心力衰竭而逝世。

sentences.english: The effect that what cures does ulcer of hyperaemia of eyeball of fluorescent element cross-eye have?
sentences.chinese: 荧光素对眼睛充血溃疡有什么治愈的作用吗？

sentences.english: We saw his lips were puffed both eyes were discolored. His face discolored and swollen.
sentences.chinese: 我们看见他嘴唇肿起，两眼充血，脸庞青肿。
妈妈有充血性心力衰竭。
